oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Rain-making. By |han=kasso (L VIII.-1. 6093-6095). The work of the rainmakers; how they 'grasp' the rain's 'ribs'. Also about the rain and the north wind. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rainmaking, when the wind is in the north
